onedcx:simpleDc.dcterms:title: APLIS 2003 GPS lead dynamics
onedcx:simpleDc.dcterms:subject: sea ice, drift, deformtion, GPS, lead dynamics
Beaufort Sea

onedcx:dcTerms.dcterms:abstract:
GPS stations (Garmin 17N receivers) were placed around a lead during the APLIS ice camp in March/April 2003. More information about the data is presented by Hutchings and Hibler [2008].
Hutchings, JK, Hibler III WD. 2008. Small-scale sea ice deformation in the Beaufort Sea seasonal ice zone. Journal of Geophysical Research. 113:C08032.
